definition: to desensitize/to remove an allergic susceptibility
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of Tiaomian-tuomin (TMTM) capsule in treating perennial allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察调免脱敏胶囊治疗常年性变应性鼻炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Conclusion System desensitization therapy is an effective treatment for functional gastrointestinal disease.
sentences.chinese: 结论系统脱敏疗法是治疗功能性胃肠病的有效方法。

sentences.english: The desensitisation of young men to gratuitously violent sexual acts is happening.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人正对无缘由的性暴力行为脱敏。

sentences.english: May have some desensitization over time.
sentences.chinese: 可能有一些脱敏随着时间的推移。

sentences.english: It's only after desensitization that patients can take this medicine.
sentences.chinese: 病人必须先脱敏，然后才能服用这种药物。

sentences.english: Can we desensitize our immune systems?
sentences.chinese: 能否使我们的免疫系统脱敏呢？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of a new desensitizer on the treatment of dentinal hypersensitivity.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究新型牙本质脱敏剂极固宁的作用机制。

sentences.english: The systematic desensitization, as basic way of behavior thereby, helps get rid of and slake the anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 采用系统脱敏法能降低和消除焦虑情绪。

sentences.english: I have not been able to desensitize and will not ever try that again.
sentences.chinese: 我一直无法到脱敏，永远不会再试一次。

sentences.english: The review presents the advances in researching at present and further researching direction on the common desensitizers of dentinal sensitivity.
sentences.chinese: 笔者主要就当前临床常用的脱敏方法作一综述。

sentences.english: Best way to deal with monitor alert overload and desensitization?
sentences.chinese: 处理监视警报过载和脱敏的最好方法？

sentences.english: People who suffer from allergies can sometimes be given injections to help desensitize them.
sentences.chinese: 患过敏反应的人有时可用注射针剂以帮助脱敏。

sentences.english: I’ll give you some courses of desensitization therapy.
sentences.chinese: 我会给您做几个疗程的脱敏治疗。

sentences.english: The application which is similar with systematic desensitization is 600 years earlier than the West.
sentences.chinese: 其中类似现代系统脱敏法的运用比西方早六百多年。

definition: intolerance (for lactose, gluten or other foods)
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
